content: hand puppets are great for storytelling motor skill development practicing vocabulary expressing emotions and confidence-building it s an excellent option for encouraging hands-on screen-free play its would also make the perfect gift for little ones learning to play together act out scenes practice new words and bring stories to life magic_ring crocodile is super easy to make and will is the perfect pattern to allow you to practice the half_double_crochet stitch to make this you will need dk yarn in green white and pink 3 5mm crochet hook embroidery needle scissors 2x 15mm safety eyes skill level - easy all patterns written using us terminology
